sentences.sContent: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
sentences.sContent_eng: My refrigerator suddenly started kicking up yesterday.
sentences.sCn: 我的冰箱昨晚突然出了故障。

sentences.sContent: The minute Tom came home he beelined for the refrigerator.
sentences.sContent_eng: The minute Tom came home he beelined for the refrigerator.
sentences.sCn: 汤姆一回到家就直奔冰箱而来。

sentences.sContent: Letters have been pouring into the office complaining about this kind of refrigerator.
sentences.sContent_eng: Letters have been pouring into the office complaining about this kind of refrigerator.
sentences.sCn: 办公室连续收到大批信件抱怨这种电冰箱。

phrases.pCn: 吸收式冷冻机；吸收式冰箱

words.tran: 冷藏（refrigerate的过去分词）；使冷却
冷藏，冷冻；使冷却；使清凉

trans.tranOther: a large piece of electrical kitchen equipment, shaped like a cupboard, used for keeping food and drink cool
